summary: A noblewoman begins to lead a dangerous double life in order to alleviate her boredom.
cast: Margaret Lockwood|James Mason|Patricia Roc|Griffith Jones|Michael Rennie|Felix Aylmer|Enid Stamp-Taylor|Francis Lister|Beatrice Varley|Amy Dalby|Martita Hunt|David Horne|Emrys Jones|Helen Goss|Muriel Aked|Aubrey Mallalieu|Ivor Barnard|Peter Madden|Jean Kent|Hilda Campbell-Russell|Diane Hart|Vincent Holman|Julie MacDermot|Valerie White
title: La mujer bandido
